settingsRefresh.description: Text for when changing a setting requires a refresh

settingsMiniLabel.description: Label for checkbox for mini player

settingsMiniDesc.message: Shows a mini player when scrolling.

settingsDislikeLabel.description: Label for checkbox for returning dislike count

settingsDislikeDesc.message: Returns the dislike counter using Return YouTube Dislike API. Disable to be compatible with native Return YouTube Dislike.

settingsTheaterLabel.description: Label for checkbox for twitch theater mode

settingsTheaterDesc.message: Locks chat next to livestream when in theater mode, similar to Twitch.

settingsCommentsLabel.description: Label for checkbox for experimental comments

settingsCommentsDesc.message: Moves the comment section to where the related section normally is, allowing easier reading of comments while watching a video.
